data.en: I don't have to 'freedom-kiss' my wife when what I really want to do is French-kiss her.

data.en: Man consists of two parts, his mind and his body, only the body has more fun.

data.en: The talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have, instead of what you don't have.

data.en: I failed to make the chess team because of my height.

data.en: Comedy just pokes at problems, rarely confronts them squarely. Drama is like a plate of meat and potatoes, comedy is rather the dessert, a bit like meringue.

data.en: Eternal nothingness is fine if you happen to be dressed for it.

data.en: I'm very proud of my gold pocket watch. My grandfather, on his deathbed, sold me this watch.
